name.en: Ocean hazards and environmental monitoring data analysis
name.ch: 海洋災害與環境監測資料分析

department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch: 本課程藉由五個海洋災害主題講解並讓學生實際使用MATLAB程式來下載、處理及分析海洋環境監測數據。學生可以擁有使用多樣化海洋環境監測系統數據的能力，以增進對海洋-氣候關係的了解、加強針對海洋和沿海災害的多災種預警判斷能力、了解氣候對海洋生態系統的潛在影響。(本課程歡迎大學部同學選修，每年主題不同，以當年課程大綱為主)
goal.en: This course is explained by five marine hazard themes and allows students to use MATLAB programs to download, process, and analyze marine environmental monitoring data. Students can develop the ability to use data from diverse ocean satellite and reanalysis data to enhance their understanding of the ocean-climate nexus, enhance multi-hazard early warning for ocean and coastal hazards, and understand the potential impacts of climate on marine ecosystems.

outline.en:
Week 1 (2025/02/20) Curriculum＆ Instruction
Week 2 (2025/02/27) Introduction of marine environmental monitoring data
Week 3~4 (2025/03/06, 03/13) Ocean warming, marine heatwaves and cold spells, and coral bleaching index
Week 5~6 (2025/03/20, 03/27) Himawari-8/9 satellite data, short-term variations
Week 7 (2025/04/03) Children‘s Day (No Class)
Week 8~9 (2025/04/10, 04/17) Mesoscale eddy and upwelling
Week 10~12 (2025/04/24, 05/01, 05/08) PORSEC 2025, EGU 2025 (No class)
Week 13 (2025/05/15) Ocean-typhoon interaction
Week 14 (2025/05/22) Climate index and  Empirical Orthogonal Function
Week 15 (2025/05/29) JpGU 2025 (No class)
Week 16 (2025/06/05) Final Oral Presentation
